Employment Type: full-time

Description:

Job details

Maintenance Manager Engineering/$$$/RELOCATION OFFERED!!

This Jobot Job is hosted by Evan Flynn

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $140,000 - $180,000 per year

A Bit About Us

Our client s a global leader in air filtration solutions with a rich history. The company specializes in providing clean air solutions for various industries, including commercial, industrial, healthcare, and residential sectors

We are seeking an experienced Engineering Manager to oversee maintenance operations within our organization. The Engineering Manager will play a crucial role in ensuring the reliability, efficiency, and safety of our manufacturing facilities and equipment.

Qualification

7-10 years of manufacturing experience with progressive leadership roles.Engineering degree (mechanical, industrial, electrical) from an accredited school required.Familiarity with CMMS (Computerized Maintenance Management System) and preventive maintenance practices.Follows all company and departmental safety protocols, including using personal protective equipment when needed.May need to work overtime or flexible hours as necessary.Performs additional tasks as assigned, some of which may become essential to the role.Excellent customer service skills with a positive, cooperative, and professional attitude.Strong organizational, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities with adaptability to change.Exceptional interpersonal skills to collaborate within a team and pass on knowledge.Ability to interpret engineering drawings and associated documentation.Proficient in reading and interpreting ladder logic diagrams and modifying PLC programs.



Why join us?


Relocation offered!!Top Compensation & Bonus!!Medical/Dental/Vision401k

Job Details

Manage day-to-day operations of the Maintenance department and coordinate with external contractors.Set goals, priorities, and evaluate staff performance to optimize resource utilization.Foster an empowered and communicative environment within the maintenance team.Oversee CapEx projects by preparing proposals, ensuring proper planning and funding, and monitoring project completion.Develop strategic capital plans for equipment replacement, capacity expansion, and cost reduction.Standardize maintenance processes, document procedures, and implement preventive maintenance programs.Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements for waste disposal, facility permits, and safety measures.Manage operating and capital budgets, develop cost reduction strategies, and collaborate with leadership teams.Demonstrate strong cross-functional leadership, communication, and teamwork skills.Provide full management responsibility for the maintenance organization, including personnel management, performance counseling, and resource allocation.Prioritize safety and collaborate with EH&S to maintain a safe work environment.Monitor staff performance, set goals, and implement improvement targets.Collaborate with internal and external resources to optimize equipment and facility performance while reducing costs and ensuring safety compliance.Lead teams to improve equipment reliability and launch continuous improvement initiatives.Cultivate a strong safety culture and ensure adherence to Environmental, Health, and Safety policies.Achieve and exceed plant business plan goals and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
